question: What is the average idle time percentage for each day of the week over the last 30 days? Return columns: day_of_week, avg_idle_pct, avg_idle_minutes. Order by day of week (Monday first). Use UTC timezone.
reasoning: Friday shows the highest idle time at 24.1%, likely correlating with end-of-week delivery congestion and increased urban traffic. Weekend patterns show significantly lower idle times, suggesting lighter operational activity. Wednesday's mid-week spike (21.4%) may relate to scheduled service calls.
